awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: Documentary depicting day to day life in Angola Prison mostly from an inmate's perspective. Interviews are with several inmates including one with a life sentence who is about to die.
plot: Documentary depicting day to day life in Angola Prison mostly from an inmate's perspective. Interviews are with several inmates including one with a life sentence who is about to die.
title: The Farm: Angola, USA
